xpaths.hint: You need one scoreDef element.
You need no attribute on the scoreDef element.
You need one staffGrp element.
You need no attribute on the staffGrp element.
staffGrp element has to be a child of scoreDef element.
You need one staffDef element.

staffDef element has to be a child of staffGrp element.

staffGrp element has to be a child of scoreDef element.
You need one staffDef element.
staffDef element has to be a child of staffGrp element.
You need two attributes on scoreDef (@key.sig & @meter.sym).
You need a @key.sig attribute with a value of 3f.
You need an @meter.sym attribute with a value of cut.
You need four attributes on staffDef (@n, @lines, @clef.shape & @clef.line).
You need a @n attribute with a value of 1.
You need a @lines attribute with a value of 5.
You need a @clef.shape attribute with a value of G.
You need a @clef.line attribute with a value of 2.
You need one section element.
You need no attribute on the section element.
section element has to be a child of score element.
You need one measure element.
measure element has to be a child of section element.
You need one attribute on measure (@n).
You need a @n attribute with a value of 0.
You need one staff element.
staff element has to be a child of measure element.
You need one attribute on staff (@n).
You need a @n attribute with a value of 1.
You need one layer element.
You need no attribute on the layer element.
layer element has to be a child of staff element.
You need one note element.
You need three attributes on note (@pname, @oct a& @dur).
You need a @pname attribute with a value of b.
You need an @oct attribute with a value of 3.
You need a @dur attribute with a value of 4.
You need one section element.
You need no attribute on the section element.
You need two measure elements.
measure element has to be a child of section element.
You need two measure children in section element.
You need one attribute on the first measure (@n).
You need a @n attribute with a value of 0 on first measure.
You need one attribute on the second measure (@n).
You need a @n attribute with a value of 1 on second measure.
You need two staff elements.
You need a staff in first measure element.
You need a staff in second measure element.
You need a staff child in every measure element.
You need one attribute on the staff of first measure (@n).
You need one attribute on the staff of first measure (@n).
You need a @n attribute with a value of 1 on first staff.
You need a @n attribute with a value of 1 on second staff.
You need two layer elements.
You need a layer element in first staff element.
You need a layer element in second staff element.
You need a layer child in every staff element.
You need no attribute on the layer elements.
You need two note elements.
First note has to be a child of first layer element.
Second note has to be a child of second layer element.
You need three attributes on the first note (@pname, @oct & @dur).
You need three attributes on the second note (@pname, @oct & @dur).
You need a @pname attribute with a value of b on first note.
You need an @oct attribute with a value of 3 on first note.
You need a @dur attribute with a value of 4 on first note.
You need a @pname attribute with a value of e on second note.
You need an @oct attribute with a value of 4 on second note.
You need a @dur attribute with a value of 4 on second note.
You need a measure element.

You need a @n attribute with a value of 1 on staff.
You need a layer element in staff element.
You need no attribute on the layer element.
First note element has to be a child of layer element.
You need three attributes on the first note (@pname, @oct & @dur).
You need a @pname attribute with a value of e on first note element.
You need an @oct attribute with a value of 4 on first note.
You need a @dur attribute with a value of 4 on first note.
You need one beam element.
beam element has to be a child of layer element.
beam element has to follow note element.
You need only one element to follow note element.
You need no attribute on the beam element.
You need two note elements inside beam element.
You need three attributes on the first beamed note (@pname, @oct & @dur).
